thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Intershop Communications AG FY ‍Ebit Of EUR 0.4 Million (Previous Year EUR -2.4 Million)​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intershop Communications AG FY ‍Ebit Of EUR 0.4 Million (Previous Year EUR -2.4 Million)​
text:
Intershop Communications Ag:
* FY TOTAL REVENUES OF EUR 35.8 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR 34.2 MILLION)
* FY ‍EBIT OF EUR 0.4 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR -2.4 MILLION)​
* FY EBITDA OF EUR 2.8 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR 0.1 MILLION)
* ‍EXPECTS GROUP REVENUES TO GROW MODERATELY IN 2018​ * OUTLOOK 2018: ALSO PROJECTS SLIGHTLY POSITIVE EBIT * OUTLOOK 2018: ALSO PROJECTS MODERATE INCREASE IN GROSS PROFIT AND GROSS MARGIN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
